channel.title: How to make the character move?
channel.description:
Hi. I'm trying to make agility in my server, and er... i want to move the character by clicking on the object, and he WALKS/CLIMBS over it, NOT teleport.
Is this possible?
EDIT: Blah blah, yeah, i know how to make "what if i use the object" stuff, i only want to know if there's a code to move the character by a script, not by teleporting.

item.title: How to make the character move?
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

ty. ill try to figure out how can i get it to work.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make the character move?
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

just get Ownage Pk source and they move, heres the code i have.
might be walktype. NOTE: I Checked client.

//Range X1: Furthest East coord. RangeY1: Furthest North coord. RangeX2: Furthest West coord. RangeY2: Furthest South coord. //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 520 3251 3432 0 3253 3434 3250 3432 2 General Store in Training Room Varrock spawn = 550 3255 3435 0 3255 3435 3255 3435 1 Lowe's Archery Store in Varrock spawn = 546 3254 3437 0 3254 3437 3254 3437 1 Magic Staves etc Shop spawn = 1658 3252 3437 0 3254 3437 3251 3432 2 Robe Shop Varrock spawn = 548 3252 3438 0 3254 3438 3251 3432 2 Thessalia Food Shop Varrock spawn = 536 3252 3439 0 3254 3439 3251 3432 2 Potions Shop in Varrock spawn = 747 3255 3433 0 3255 3433 3255 3433 1 Weapons Shop in Varrock spawn = 209 3258 3436 0 3260 3437 3256 3435 2 Barrows Shop

item.title: How to make the character move?
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

[quote=“xxchainxx, post:14, topic:51639”]omg this is sooo easy…

go into your autospawn.cfg

and here is an ex.

spawn = 2745	2375	5068	0	3104	5068	3104	5068	1	Jad

were it says 3104 5068 3104 and 5068 thats were it can walk around at just change that and it can walk were u want it to :)[/quote]NOO you didnt read what i said. I said CHARACTER not NPC! dont think im a noob pls

Read full topic
